comments:
Build 20020423 integration
When trying to switch the Close editors automatically preference (Window -> 
Preferences -> Workbench).  I am receiving a Null pointer exception.  After 
initially installing the release, I was able to check the option the first 
time.  Subsequent changes cause the Null pointer when apply or ok is selected.  
After initially enabling the option, I pinned a Java editor in a Java Browser 
Perspective.

Answering yes to the Internal Error has occured, Close workspace causes an 
error was occured while closing the workbench.  The Preference dialog remains 
open.  You must cancel Preference dialog to get Eclipse to exit.

There are several problems here, including our error handling, and possibly 
part lifecycle.
*** Bug 14539 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Entered bug 14561 for the NPE in PackageExplorerPart.dispose.
